Header: Jaffna Commander, Chief Guest at Prize-Giving
Content: Major General Ruwan Wanigasooriya, Commander, Security Forces - Jaffna was invited to be the Chief Guest at the annual concert and prize-giving ceremony of the Park - Joohon pre-school at Sithankerni, Jaffna on Saturday (30). The pre-school kids after garlanding the dayâ€™s Chief Guest welcomed him and ushered him to the hall before the lighting of the traditional oil lamp took place. Afterwards, Major General Wanigasooriya joined the distribution of prizes to the kids after he witnessed their artistic talents and skills. General Officer Commanding 51 Division, Senior Officers, pre-school staff and parents were present during the event.
